trans-unit.source: Defines a map for converting colors.

Several methods of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> class adjust image colors by using a color-remap table, which is an array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageAttributes" /> 類別的數個方法會藉由使用色彩重新對應表 (這是 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap" /> 結構的陣列) 來調整影像色彩。

trans-unit.source: This class defines a mapping between existing colors and the new colors to which they are to be converted.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別定義之間現有的色彩和新的色彩，它們是要轉換的對應。

trans-unit.source: When the map is applied, any pixel of the old color is converted to the new color.
trans-unit.target: 當套用對應時，舊色彩的所有像素會轉換成新的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Imaging.ColorMap" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure to which to convert.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要轉換成的新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure to which to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換成的新 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the existing <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure to be converted.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要轉換的現有 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The existing <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure to be converted.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的現有 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構。
